summary: Cameron's Law (H.R. 1414) aims to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the orphan drug tax credit. The bill, introduced in the House of Representatives on February 18, 2025, by Mr. Gottheimer and co-sponsors, seeks to restore the tax credit by changing the percentage from 25 percent to 50 percent. This change would apply to taxable years beginning after the act's enactment.
